synopsis.text: Nishimura Hideki, a naive otaku, once confessed his feelings to a girl in an online game, only to be rejected and discover she was an older man in reality. Swearing off trusting online girls, Hideki's resolve is tested when a beautiful girl named Tamaki Ako confesses her love for him. As it turns out, Ako struggles to differentiate between the virtual and real world, causing her to become a socially awkward loner. Determined to help her, Hideki and his online guild friends band together to support Ako in overcoming her challenges, leading to unexpected revelations and a complicated journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
